name: Strength And Courage Are Not For Sale
description:
Any hardcore kid from the mid 2000's would know Stretch Arm Strong, the design originally entitled Strength & Courage was inspired by their lyric from a song on  'A Revolution Transmission'

Stay humble, live your life true to who you are and stay true to your convictions, because strength and courage are not for sale!

www.loyaltyanddevotion.com We deliver worldwide!
